name: The House on the Right
description:
Welcome Detective,

You were called to this house on the right side. Sarah Zuch and Diana Burnwood are the dead victims.Find out what happend, who did it and why (complete the puzzle in your head because i am not a programmer and its a mircale that this even runs in 5:4 (sorry)).

You can move around with WASD and if you need to take a closer look press the right mouse button. Also use your sharp mind. Good luck with your case, Detective.

If you found out the solution, please comment or send it to me one twitter. https://twitter.com/who_kai

made for Ludum dare 36
